messages.title: Your vote TODAY will be the difference
messages.content: Five years ago, the Labour Minister in charge of spending taxpayers' money left us a note saying: 'I'm afraid there is no money.' Five years on, the Conservatives are building a stronger economy and securing a brighter future for all of us. Let's not go back to square one.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives are building a stronger economy and securing a brighter future for all of us.

issues.economy: The Conservatives are building a stronger economy.

images.caption: A reproduction of a note from the previous Labour Minister saying: 'I'm afraid there is no money.'

leaflet.additionalNotes: To keep the economy strong Vote Conservative here today
